title: Definitions: Other Properties.
description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate other keys, objects or constraints variously applicable to Annotations, Bodies and/or Targets (Section 3.3).

createdValidIfPresent.title: Validation: created value
createdValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has no created or a single created of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)

createdPropertyFound.title: Collate: created key with qualifying body/target classes
createdPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of created (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)
